name: Avery Brooks
bio: Community planner with a background in urban design. Focuses on parks and safe streets.

bio: Small business owner who mentors youth apprentices. Interested in local entrepreneurship.

bio: Hydrologist experienced in water management. Works on drought resilience and river health.

bio: Neighborhood volunteer and librarian. Advocates for accessible city services.

bio: Renewable energy engineer focused on grid reliability and affordability.

bio: Transportation analyst working on transit reliability and traffic safety.

bio: Public health coordinator. Interested in walkability and air quality.

bio: Higher-ed advisor. Interested in pathways from school to career.
